code:
import turtle

wn = turtle.Screen()
wn.bgcolor('white')

t1 = turtle.Turtle()
t1.color('red')
t1.speed(1)

for i in range(4):
    t1.forward(100)
    t1.right(90)

guide.img: You can also decide at which speed your turtle should move using the speed function. 1 is the slowest, and the speed increases as u increase the number. if u want to set it to the fastest speed, just give it 0.
